statements: SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights;
SELECT weight_name, weight_value FROM neural_network_weights ORDER BY weight_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights WHERE weight_id = 1;
SELECT weight_name FROM neural_network_weights WHERE weight_value > 0.5;
SELECT weight_id, weight_name, weight_value FROM neural_network_weights ORDER BY weight_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights WHERE weight_id = 1;
SELECT weight_name, weight_value FROM neural_network_weights WHERE weight_id > 10;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights WHERE weight_value BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.8 ORDER BY weight_id DESC;
SELECT weight_id, weight_name FROM neural_network_weights WHERE weight_name LIKE '%bias%';
SELECT AVG(weight_value) AS avg_weight_value FROM neural_network_weights;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights;
SELECT weight_name, weight_value FROM neural_network_weights WHERE weight_value > 0.5;
SELECT weight_name, weight_value FROM neural_network_weights ORDER BY weight_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM model_parameters;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM model_parameters WHERE parameter_value < 0.2;
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights WHERE weight_value > 0.5 ORDER BY weight_name DESC
SELECT weight_id, weight_name FROM neural_network_weights WHERE weight_value BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7
SELECT MAX(weight_value) AS max_weight_value FROM neural_network_weights
SELECT weight_id, COUNT(weight_id) AS weight_count FROM neural_network_weights GROUP BY weight_id
SELECT n.weight_id, n.weight_name, m.parameter_name, m.parameter_value FROM neural_network_weights n INNER JOIN model_parameters m ON n.weight_id = m.parameter_id
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights;
SELECT layer_id, weight FROM neural_network_weights WHERE layer_id = 3;
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM neural_network_parameters ORDER BY parameter_id DESC;
SELECT model_id, deployment_status, deployment_date FROM model_deployment WHERE model_id = 1;
SELECT model_id, deployment_status FROM model_deployment WHERE deployment_status = 'deployed';
SELECT * FROM neural_network_weights ORDER BY layer_id DESC, weight ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT layer_id, AVG(weight) as average_weight FROM neural_network_weights GROUP BY layer_id HAVING average_weight > 0.5 ORDER BY average_weight DESC;
SELECT parameter_name, SUM(parameter_value) as total_value FROM neural_network_parameters GROUP BY parameter_name ORDER BY total_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM model_deployment WHERE deployment_status = 'completed' AND deployment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY deployment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT model_id, COUNT(model_id) as total_deployments FROM model_deployment GROUP BY model_id HAVING total_deployments > 1 ORDER BY total_deployments DESC;
SELECT layer_name, update_time, weight_data FROM neural_network_weights
SELECT description, parameter_name, parameter_value FROM neural_network_parameters
SELECT layer_id, layer_name, activation_function FROM model_layers
SELECT * FROM model_parameters
SELECT parameter_name, parameter_value FROM model_parameters ORDER BY parameter_value DESC
SELECT layer_name, weight_data, update_time FROM neural_network_weights ORDER BY update_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM neural_network_parameters WHERE parameter_name LIKE 'learning_rate%'
SELECT layer_name, activation_function FROM model_layers WHERE activation_function IN ('ReLU', 'Sigmoid')
SELECT * FROM model_parameters ORDER BY parameter_id DESC
SELECT DISTINCT layer_name, update_time FROM neural_network_weights WHERE update_time > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM NeuralNetworkModel;
SELECT model_name, architecture FROM NeuralNetworkModel;
SELECT model_id, epochs, loss FROM TrainingHistory WHERE accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT func_id, function_name FROM ActivationFunctions ORDER BY func_id DESC;
SELECT model_id, learning_rate, optimizer FROM HyperparameterTuning WHERE learning_rate < 0.01;
SELECT * FROM NeuralNetworkModel WHERE id = 1;
SELECT model_name, architecture FROM NeuralNetworkModel WHERE model_name LIKE 'ResNet%';
SELECT * FROM LayerWeights ORDER BY layer_id DESC;
SELECT function_name FROM ActivationFunctions WHERE func_id = 3;
SELECT model_id, epochs, loss, accuracy FROM TrainingHistory WHERE accuracy > 0.85 ORDER BY epochs DESC;
